passive.name: GIFT OF THE DROWNED ONES
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) GIFT OF THE DROWNED ONES
                                Stores 10% (10 + 0.35% ) of damage taken from champions, increased to 50% (50 + 0.65% ) if there are two or more visible enemy champions nearby. Damage stored cannot exceed 160 (lower value between 65%  and 146 + 800% bonus ).When Pyke is not visible to enemies, he heals for the amount of damage stored.Pyke cannot increase his max Health and converts 14 bonus Health to 1 Attack Damage.

q.name: (Q) BONE SKEWER
q.description:
(Q) BONE SKEWER
 10/9/8/7s   35/40/45/50 
                                
                                
                                Charge: Slows himself by 15% for up to 3s, increasing cast range over the first 0.8s.Release: Hurls his spear, dealing 130 physical damage (130/195/260/325 + 60% bonus  ), slowing the target by 90% for 1s and pulling it in. Releasing the ability immediately will cause Pyke to thrust his spear instead, dealing the same damage.Deals 50% damage to minions.Deals 50% damage to monsters.If BONE SKEWER is overcharged it refunds a portion of it's cooldown and 50% of its mana cost.

w.name: (W) GHOSTWATER DIVE
w.description:
(W) GHOSTWATER DIVE
 10.5/10/9.5/9s  
                                
                                
                                Becomes camouflaged for 5 seconds and gains 40% Movements Speed (40 + 2%  ) that decays over the duration.

e.name: (E) PHANTOM UNDERTOW
e.description:
(E) PHANTOM UNDERTOW
 11/10.5/10/9.5s   40 
                                
                                
                                Dashes forward, leaving behind a phantom. After 1 second, the phantom returns to Pyke, dealing 120 physical damage (120/175/230/285 + 100% bonus  ) to enemy champions and stunning for 1.5 (1.5 + 1% ) seconds.Deals 50% damage to minionsDeals 50% damage to monsters.

r.name: (R) DEATH FROM BELOW
r.description:
(R) DEATH FROM BELOW
 80/70/60s   100 
                                
                                
                                Marks target area with an X, executing enemy champions below 250 (250 + 80% bonus  + 250/400/550% ) health. Non-champions and champions above the threshold take 50% of this amount as physical damage.If an emeny champion is struck, Pyke blinks to the location. If he was executed Pyke can recast DEATH FROM BELOW within 15s.Each execution grants Pyke 100% bounty gold. If there's an assisting ally, grant them 100% gold, and  grant Pyke 160% gold (up to 600). Enemies killed by an ally inside the X grant Pyke 160% gold (up to 600).
